forumNotes.author: wimb
forumNotes.content:
![Posted Image](http://reboot.pro/index.php?app=downloads&module=display&section=screenshot&id=594)
**File Name** : UEFI_MULTI-addon  
**File Submitter** : [wimb](http://reboot.pro/index.php?showuser=9517 "")  
**File Submitted** : 17 Apr 2019  
**File Updated** : *21 Mar 2021*   
**File Category** : [Boot tools](http://reboot.pro/index.php?app=downloads&showcat=7 "")  

**Download:** [USB_FORMAT](https://github.com/wimbrts/USB_FORMAT/releases "External link") and [UEFI_MULTI](https://github.com/wimbrts/UEFI_MULTI/releases "External link")  

Collection of Portable Apps for [UEFI_MULTI](http://reboot.pro/files/file/279-uefi-multi-make-multi-boot-usb-drive/ "")  

Encrypted with password = **bootwimb**   

After Download use R-mouse 7-zip menu to **Extract here** will add folder **Port_Apps** to existing folder UEFI_MULTI-57  

[Click here to download this file](http://reboot.pro/index.php?app=downloads&showfile=594 "")

forumNotes.author: wimb
forumNotes.content:
The folder Port_Apps containing a collection of useful Portable Apps and originally belonging to UEFI_MULTI package is now seperately as download available.

In this way the size of [UEFI_MULTI](http://reboot.pro/files/file/279-uefi-multi-make-multi-boot-usb-drive/ "") package is reduced and is now below the limit of 9.8 MB for hosting the file UEFI_MULTI at reboot.pro Downloads Boot tools Section.
